data.title: Springfield Thunderbirds
data.meta_description: Springfield Thunderbirds Front Office staff AHL
data.text:
Name: Jessica Hansen

Position: Director of Finance & Human Resources

Hometown: Feeding Hills, MA

College: Western New England College

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Red Sox

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Gymnastics

Favorite Musical Artist: Cole Swindell

Favorite Movie: Miracle

Favorite Food: Bread (any kind)

Favorite Vacation Spot: Fort Myers

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Chaired and hosted a National Tournament of over 500 participants in multiple sports and cultural events for the American Turners. Have since served on the National Committee for this event at two other sites in the U.S.

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? The last time Springfield won a Calder Cup.

Name: Ryan Smith

Position: Manager, Media/Community Relations & Broadcasting

Hometown: Doylestown, PA

College: Penn State University

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Penn State Nittany Lion Hockey (or my Phillies/Eagles)

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Any of football/baseball/lacrosse

Favorite Musical Artist: Avicii, or almost anything in the EDM realm

Favorite Movie: Miracle (this is not a debatable question).

Favorite Food: Chocolate Chip cookies

Favorite Vacation Spot: Toronto in the winter, Ocean City, NJ in the summer

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Reaching the AHL before my 26th birthday / calling my first NHL action in Boston in 2022

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? February 22, 1980, the Miracle on Ice in Lake Placid

Click Here to contact Ryan

Name: Drew Supernor

Position: Manager, Brand Development & Merchandise

Hometown: Springfield, MA

College: Springfield College

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Boston Red Sox

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Baseball or Football

Favorite Musical Artist: Listen to everything, not a fan of anyone in particular.

Favorite Movie: Field of Dreams

Favorite Food: Venison

Favorite Vacation Spot: Annual family trip to Hampton Beach. Also can't go wrong with Miami.

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Bringing luck wherever I go that I’m always with a winning team!!!

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? January 14, 1973 to witness the Miami Dolphins cap off Super Bowl VII with the only undefeated season in NFL history

Hometown: East Amherst, NY

College: Columbus College of Art and Design

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Predators

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): bubble hockey

Favorite Musical Artist: Umphreys McGee

Favorite Movie: Kung fu Panda

Favorite Food: I have a Sweet tooth

Favorite Vacation Spot: staycations are the way to go

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Part of the team that rebranded the Atlanta Hawks

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? I would repeat my experience with the Dave Matthews Band at The Crown in Cincinnati OH in 1999.

Hometown: Fieldsboro, NJ

College: Southern New Hampshire University

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Philadelphia Flyers

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Football

Favorite Musical Artist: Eminem

Favorite Movie: I don’t have a specific one, but my favorite genre is Comedy

Favorite Food: Seafood

Favorite Vacation Spot: Orlando, FL or Portsmouth NH

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Starting my career path with the Thunderbirds

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? Watching the Flyers win their first Stanley Cup!

Hometown: Stafford Springs, CT

College: Nichols College

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Boston Celtics

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Basketball

Favorite Musical Artist: J. Cole

Favorite Movie: Avengers End Game

Favorite Food: Chips & Queso

Favorite Vacation Spot St. Marten

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Organizing 2 successful Sports Career Fairs to help others get their start in the sport industry

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? June 17, 2008 to see the Celtics beat the Lakers & win the NBA Finals in person

Hometown: Agawam, MA

College: Colby-Sawyer College

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Boston Red Sox

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Tennis

Favorite Musical Artist: Jonas Brothers

Favorite Movie: n/a

Favorite Food: Mac and Cheese

Favorite Vacation Spot: Florida or Cape Cod

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Establishing core digital marketing and community relations efforts for a high-end landscape architecture firm where I worked as an intern before being hired full-time.

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? Playing a tennis tournament on grass courts at the Newport Tennis Hall of Fame – it was such a cool experience!

Hometown: Somers, CT

College: Eastern Connecticut State University

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Tampa Bay Buccaneers

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Football

Favorite Musical Artist: Linkin Park

Favorite Movie: The Godfather

Favorite Food: Cheeseburgers

Favorite Vacation Spot: Tampa, Florida

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Being hired by the Springfield Thunderbirds

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be?: Witness Super Bowl XXXVII in person.

Name: James Woodward

Position: Account Executive

Hometown: Hartford, CT

College: Western New England University

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): New York Yankees

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Basketball

Favorite Musical Artist: Travis Scott

Favorite Movie: Anything Marvel

Favorite Food: Fettucine Alfredo

Favorite Vacation Spot: North Carolina

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Getting hired before graduation

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? The 2000 World Series to watch the Yankees beat the rival Mets

Name: Joe Manning

Position: Inside Sales Specialist

Hometown: Wilbraham, MA

College: Springfield College

Favorite Sports Team (Besides the Thunderbirds): Boston Celtics

Favorite Sport to Watch (besides hockey): Basketball

Favorite Musical Artist: Luke Combs

Favorite Movie: A Few Good Men

Favorite Food: Chicken Parmesan

Favorite Vacation Spot: Cape Cod

Proudest Career Accomplishment: Meeting Billie Jean King and giving her a campus tour of Springfield College

If you could travel back in time to one day or event, what would it be? February 22, 1980 to watch Team USA beat the Soviets in the Miracle on Ice
